content:
# Coursera for AGH University-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/news/detail/coursera-for-agh-university
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:21

Coursera for AGH University 

 04-02-2025 

 Excellence Initiative – Research University 

 As part of the IDUB project, this calendar year, all AGH University students and employees may use the e-learning platform Coursera for free, including courses in programming, data analytics, and soft skills, and more. There are 543 courses available within the license. The offer made for the AGH University allows the registered users to participate in as many courses as they wish. 

To join the platform, log in at 
Coursera
 with your AGH University e-mail address (students – @student.agh.edu.pl, staff – @agh.edu.pl).

Then, choose the right programme for you:

staff: 
coursera.org/programs/career-academy-for-alumni

students: 
coursera.org/programs/career-academy-for-students

After joining the platform (following the first login), you must complete at least one course by the end of December 2025!

Each course ends with a certificate confirming the acquisition of relevant competencies.

In case of technical issues, please contact: 
mikolaj.krawczyk(at)agh.edu.pl

Back
